All Classes

Class Description
Box
simple box with some checks and mathematical operators
Box.Side
sides of box
Camera
camera used to determine where to render a scene
Entity
entity to be placed in a scene, includes physics and a sprite
Keyboard
class to keep track of key strokes allowing multiple key presses
Mouse
class to keep track of mouse buttons and motions
Physics
axis-aligned bounding box physics entity
Pseudo3D
main application for any project using Pseudo3D
Renderer
scene renderer, will turn a scene into a render on a javafx canvas
Scene
scene to place entities, a camera, and code injections to modify them
Sprite
sprites to be rendered in game
Vector
immutable vector with vector mathematical operators
